title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: Currently, when a table report item is added without setting the dataset, and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog does not appear.
EB: The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not defined. This would allow the user to go ahead and define a group, irrespective of whether the dataset is defined or not.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
